title: Khawiah pawh ni chhuahna piangah
lyrics:
Khawiah pawh ni chhuahna 'piangah,
Isua, Lalin ro a rel dawn;
Thla thar det ban hma loh hi chuan,
Khawvelah a ram a zau vang.

A hnena tawngtai tawp hlei lo,
Hla saka fak nen a chho fo;
A hming englo rimtui ang hian,
Khawvar telin a leng chhuak ang.

Mihring tawng tinreng hmangte chuan,
A hmangaih chungah hla an chhuang;
Nausen tawng thei chauhvin a hming,
An fak bawk thin, tarte pawhin.

A lal hmunah malsawm an ngah,
Mi tangte an lo zuang chhuak a;
Nun ningin chatuan chawlh an chang,
Retheite pawh an lo puar fan.

A lalzia chhuah hmun apiangah,
Thihna anchhia a bo thin a;
Amahah Adam thlah sualin,
An hloh ai chuan an chang tha thin.

Isuan ram neih a thulh thei lo,
Chang tura man pek h nu a tho;
Pa Pathianin a kaih thawh hian,
A hming a ziak - ram lehkhaan.
